author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Place the blackberries, wine, sugar and yoghurt into a food processor and blend until smooth. To serve, pour the berry mixture into a tall glass and top with the whipped cream.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz blackberries,  50ml/2fl oz red wine,  25g/1oz caster sugar,  100g/3½oz Greek yoghurt,  50ml/2fl oz whipped cream
